dependancy_needs_updating.title: Mobile application has been updated
dependancy_needs_updating.description:
A change has occured to the OAuth authentication method used by the Nintendo Switch Parental Controls mobile app.

This issue is not resolvable, please use the learn more link to report this issue to the maintainer.

configuration_error.title: Error setting up {name}
configuration_error.description:
There was a problem with the response from Nintendo for this device, check the logs for further information.

This can occur due to a config issue with the parental control settings.

Before reporting this issue, make sure that debug mode has been turned on and reload the integration.

user.description: To obtain your access token, click [Nintendo Login]({link}) to sign in to your Nintendo account. Then, for the account you want to link, right-click on the red **Select this person** button and choose **Copy Link Address**.

data_description.api_token: The link copied from the Nintendo website
